traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The netherspark has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magic effects.

traits.name: Necrotic Aura
traits.desc: Being composed of necrotic energy, a netherspark radiates an aura of such energy in a 10-foot radius. Any creature that’s not an undead that enters or starts its turn within this area takes 7 (2d6) necrotic damage. Undead in the area instead regain 7 (2d6) hit points, up to their maximum hit points at the beginning of each of their turns.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The netherspark makes three slam attacks.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) necrotic damage.

actions.name: Necrotic Ray
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range 40 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d8+3) necrotic damage. Undead take no damage but heal a number of hit points equal to what the ray would otherwise deal.

actions.name: Necrotic Burst (Recharge 5–6)
actions.desc: A netherspark can release a burst of necrotic energy in a 20-foot radius around it. Creatures in the area must make a DC 13 Constitution saving throw, taking 12 (2d8+3) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Undead take no damage but heal a number of hit points equal to what the burst would otherwise deal.
